          <title>
            <string language="en">Light travels through vacuum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht reist durch Vakuum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La lumière voyage par le vide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A luz viaja com o vácuo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La luce attraversa through il vuoto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελαφριά ταξίδια μέσω του κενού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La luz viaja con vacío</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Third of three illustrations showing what happens during a concert on the Moon. People on Earth will see the laser lights but will not hear the sound from the concert because light can travel in vacuum while sound cannot.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">moon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">echoes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">laser light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sound waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vacuum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vibrations</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Third drei Abbildungen des Darstellens, was 
während eines Konzerts auf dem Mond geschieht. Leute auf Masse 
sehen, die Laserlichte aber hören nicht den Ton vom Konzert, weil 
Licht in Vakuum reisen kann, während Ton nicht kann.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tiers de montrer de trois illustrations ce qui se 
produit pendant un concert sur la lune. Les gens sur terre 
verront les lumières de laser mais n'entendront pas le bruit du 
concert parce que la lumière peut voyager dans le vide alors que le 
bruit ne peut pas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Third de mostrar de três ilustrações o que 
acontece durante um concert na lua. Os povos na terra verão as 
luzes de laser mas não ouvirão o som do concert porque a luz pode 
viajar no vácuo quando o som não puder.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un terzo di un mostrare delle tre illustrazioni che
cosa accade durante il concerto sulla luna. La gente su terra 
vedrà le luci di laser ma non sentirà il suono dal concerto perché 
la luce può viaggiare nel vuoto mentre il suono non può.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρίτο τριών απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν τι συμβαίνει 
κατά τη διάρκεια μιας συναυλίας στο φεγγάρι. Οι άνθρωποι 
στη γη θα δουν τα φώτα λέιζερ αλλά δεν θα ακούσουν τον
ήχο από τη συναυλία επειδή το φως μπορεί να ταξιδεψει στο κενό 
ενώ ο ήχος δεν μπορεί.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tercero de mostrar de tres ilustraciones qué 
sucede durante un concierto en la luna. La gente en la tierra 
verá las luces laser pero no oirá el sonido del concierto porque la 
luz puede viajar en vacío mientras que no puede el sonido.</string>
          </description>
